tool_description: An API showing all the latest data from the Serie A
name: Serie A Data
title: Serie A Data

api_list.name: Get Teams Goals
api_list.description: Get the standing of teams' goals
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serie-a-data.p.rapidapi.com/teamstats/goals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serie-a-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Calendar Day
api_list.description: Get all the matches in a specified calendar day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serie-a-data.p.rapidapi.com/calendar/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serie-a-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serie-a-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Standing
api_list.description: Get current standings from Serie A
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serie-a-data.p.rapidapi.com/standing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serie-a-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
